answer:
Sure, here is the answer to the question:

Gobi Desert is located in Central Asia and spans the northern part of China, Mongolia and the southern part of Russia.

The Mongolian Gobi spans the southern tip of the Mongolian Plateau and the Alashan Gobi lies south of the Alashan Plateau between the North Tengri and North Gobi Mountains.
